1 cup barbeque sauce
1 cup teriyaki sauce
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer

3 teaspoons thinly sliced fresh ginger root

line.originaltext: 1 onion, finely chopped
3 teaspoons coarsely ground black pepper
